original_text: Hear this message from the Lord, you people who respect his teaching. Some of your own people hate you. They throw you out, because you are faithful to me. They laugh at you and they say, ‘Let the Lord show how great he is! We want to see him make you happy!’ But it is those people who will be ashamed. Hear this message from the Lord, you people who respect his teaching. Some of your own people hate you. They throw you out, because you are faithful to me. They laugh at you and they say, ‘Let the Lord show how great he is! We want to see him make you happy!’
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀으로 말미암아 떠는 자들아 그의 말씀을 들을지어다 이르시되 너희 형제가 너희를 미워하며 내 이름으로 말미암아 너희를 쫓아내며 이르기를 여호와께서는 영광을 나타내사 너희 기쁨을 우리에게 보이시기를 원하노라 하였으나 그들은 수치를 당하리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Hear this message from the Lord
you people who respect his teaching
Some of your own people hate you
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 동족 중 일부가 당신을 미워합니다

sentences.original_text: because you are faithful to me
'Let the Lord show how great he is!'
'We want to see him make you happy!'
sentences.korean_translation: '우리는 그가 당신을 행복하게 만드는 것을 보고 싶습니다!'

sentences.original_text: But it is those people who will be ashamed
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 수치를 당할 사람은 바로 그 사람들입니다

sentences.original_text: Hear this message from the Lord
you people who respect his teaching
Some of your own people hate you
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 동족 중 일부가 당신을 미워합니다

sentences.original_text: because you are faithful to me
'Let the Lord show how great he is!'
'We want to see him make you happy!'
sentences.korean_translation: '우리는 그가 당신을 행복하게 만드는 것을 보고 싶습니다!'
